name: BR1
notes: Erection of fourteen dwellings with associated access and landscaping works

name: BR2
notes: Permission granted for residential development but not implemented. Residential development.

name: BR3
notes: Permission granted for residential development but not implemented. Site allocated in emerging Local Plan 2031 for residential development. Erection of two hundred dwellings with associated landscaping and play areas

name: BR4
notes: Permission granted subject to S106. Outline application for residential re-development of up to 15 dwellings and associated works. All matters reserved except for access.

name: BR5
notes: Permission granted for mixed use development. Allocated in the emerging local Plan 2031 for residential development. Re-development of former airfield for housing-led development comprising up to 50 dwellings

name: BR6
notes: Site allocated in emerging Local Plan 2031 for residential development. Redevelopment of land for housing (as first approved under application 06/1158/p/op)

name: BR7
notes: Existing use but has been promoted by owners through the Strategic Housing and Economic Land Availability Assessment (SHELAA). Assessed asa suitable for residential development

name: BR8
notes: Site is allocated for residential development in the emerging Local Plan 2031. Demolition of all existing buildings, formation of a new access from Main Road and erection of 25 new houses and apartments with ancillary car parking and garaging

name: BR9
notes: Site assessed as suitable for residential development in the SHELAA

name: BR10
notes: Residential development allowed on edge of existing employment site. Erection of five dwellings and associated infrastructure.

name: BR12
notes: Permission granted for residential development but not implemented. Demolition of existing building, erection of eight flats, two maisonettes, new village shop and alterations to existing access.

name: BR11
notes: Site forms part of emerging Local Plan Strategic Developmet Area. Erection of 77 dwellings (comprising a mix of 1 bedroom flats and 2, 3, 4 and 5 bedroom houses), open space, car parking and all associated landscaping and ancillary works. Formation of new vehicular access.

name: BR13
notes: Brownfield element forms only part of site. Up to a maximum of 257 homes together with public open spaces; landscaping, new access to Downs Road and other associated works.

name: BR14
notes: Brownfield element forms only part of whole site. Outline planning application for demolition of existing buildings and erection of up to 100 residential dwellings including 40% affordable housing, creation of new vehicular access off of Banbury Road and provision of public open space with associated infrastructure and earthworks. All matters reserved except accessibility to the site, for vehicles in terms of the positioning an

name: BR15
notes: Vacant first floor of existing building permitted for change of ue from office to residential. Conversion of first floor to create five flats.
